feed.title: Toshi Parmar /t̪oːʂiː prmaːr/
feed.subtitle: Building this site, bit by byte; briefly they live, burning chondrites.

entry.title: Welcome to my webpage!
entry.content:
Hi there!

I am slowly migrating my work here. In the meantime, have you made firends with Batuk yet?

It has taken me a while in my life to begin to collate all my scattered blogs into one cohesive site. For a long time I was plagued by the words 'cohesive' and 'professional'; I could not fathom how to fuse my fragmented self together into a fluid tapestry. But I learned from my wiser friends that a patchwork collage is just as cohesive (check out their site here!)
